titles.title: Inland Empire Water Resources Preservation Act
To direct the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study to determine the feasibility of carrying out a project for water supply for Rialto, Fontana, and Colton, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Introduced. Inland Empire Water Resources Preservation Act - Directs the Secretary of the Army to study the feasibility of carrying out a water supply project for Rialto, Fontana, and Colton, California.
